gameRecap.title: Game Recap: 76ers 116, Grizzlies 96
gameRecap.excerpt: Philadelphia defeats Memphis, 116-96. For Philadelphia, Joel Embiid led the way with 30 points, 12 rebounds, and two blocks while aided by Kelly Oubre Jr. (17 points, five rebounds, five assists, two steals) in the victory. Scottie Pippen Jr. finished with a career-high 24 points, five assists, two steals with GG Jackson recording 17 points, six rebounds, and two steals for Memphis in the losing effort. Philadelphia improves to 43-35, while Memphis moves to 27-51 with the loss.
